br.ufu.facom.minas.example

Class KDD99

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.ufu.facom.minas.example.KDD99

  • public class KDD99
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to apply MINAS to the KDD99 dataset. If you are looking for a more detailed example of how to execute MINAS and also how to print the results in external files, please check the MOA3 class.
    Since:
    1.0
